jenkins.triggers.ReverseBuildTrigger.upstreamProjects: llvm-toolchain-binaries-sync, llvm-toolchain-bionic-binaries-sync, llvm-toolchain-bullseye-binaries-sync, llvm-toolchain-buster-binaries-sync, llvm-toolchain-focal-binaries-sync, llvm-toolchain-hirsute-binaries-sync, llvm-toolchain-impish-binaries-sync

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
REKOR_PATH=~/rekor
chmod +x $REKOR_PATH ls -al $REKOR_PATH $REKOR_PATH version LIST=$(find /srv/repository/ -iname '*.dsc' -o -iname '*.xz')
ALREADY_PROCESS=/srv/repository/in_rekor.txt
for f in $LIST; do echo $f sign=$f.asc dist_path=$(echo $f|sed -e "s|/srv/repository/||g")
if test ! -f $sign; then gpg --batch --yes --armor -u sylvestre@debian.org --output /$sign --detach-sig $f fi
if ! grep $sign $ALREADY_PROCESS; then # hasn't been processed before, let's do it url=https://apt.llvm.org/$dist_path if curl --output /dev/null --silent --head --fail $url; then $REKOR_PATH upload --rekor_server https://rekor.sigstore.dev --signature $sign --public-key ~/sigstore.public.key --artifact $url $REKOR_PATH verify --rekor_server https://rekor.sigstore.dev --signature $sign --public-key ~/sigstore.public.key --artifact $url scp -o StrictHostKeyChecking=accept-new $sign apt@apt-origin.llvm.org:/data/apt/www/$dist_path.asc echo $sign >> $ALREADY_PROCESS else echo "$url failed" >> /tmp/fail.txt fi fi done
cat /tmp/fail.txt rm /tmp/fail.txt
